response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, it is worth $8,000 to me. Considering its immense worth to both us and potential buyers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This exclusive offer is available only for a limited time, so please let me know if you are interested in securing this opportunity. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 7200}
